scripts.start: concurrently -k "yarn workspace @holochain-scaffolding/definitions run build:watch" "yarn workspace @type-craft/crafting run build:watch" "yarn workspace @holochain-scaffolding/generators run build:watch" "yarn workspace @holochain-scaffolding/elements run build:watch" "yarn workspace @holochain-scaffolding/events run build:watch" "yarn workspace @holochain-scaffolding/ui run build:watch" "yarn workspace @holochain/create run start"
scripts.build: yarn workspace @holochain-scaffolding/vocabulary run build && yarn workspace @holochain-scaffolding/definitions run build && yarn workspace @holochain-scaffolding/generators run build && yarn workspace @holochain-scaffolding/elements run build && yarn workspace @holochain-scaffolding/vue run build && yarn workspace @holochain-scaffolding/events run build && yarn workspace @holochain-scaffolding/ui run build && yarn workspace @holochain/create run build
